thread.title: 'Bachelor' Alum Selma Alameri Marries Patrick Daniels -- See the Sweet Photos!
thread.title_full: 'Bachelor' Alum Selma Alameri Marries Patrick Daniels -- See the Sweet Photos!

author: Tina Smithers Peckham
title: 'Bachelor' Alum Selma Alameri Marries Patrick Daniels -- See the Sweet Photos!
text: 'Bachelor' Alum Selma Alameri Marries Patrick Daniels -- See the Sweet Photos! by Tina Smithers Peckham 10:13 AM PST, December 31, 2016 Photo: Instagram Sean Lowe, who? Former Bachelor contestant Selma Alameri married her fiancé, Patrick Daniels, on Thursday in an intimate wedding ceremony in San Diego, California. A photo posted by Selma Alameri (@selmaalameri) on Dec 29, 2016 at 2:21pm PST A photo posted by Selma Alameri (@selmaalameri) on Dec 29, 2016 at 2:33pm PST “I get to love him forever and ever!” she captioned another sweet snap. “Sorry guys- last one I promise!” A photo posted by Selma Alameri (@selmaalameri) on Dec 29, 2016 at 3:34pm PST EXCLUSIVE: Former 'Bachelorette' Emily Maynard on Raising Three Kids and Finding Happiness After Reality TV Alameri, who was raised by strict Muslim parents, competed against 25 other love hopefuls during season 17 of The Bachelor and rose to fame when she shockingly refused to make out with Sean Lowe during their one-on-one date in the desert. "I don’t believe showing affection in public is a bad thing, but my mom does," the reality star told People at the time. "Her one simple request was don’t make out with somebody on television. We have such a strong culture and my family is big in my life, so I needed to test Sean to see if he’d respect my family and culture." Lowe, 33, later sent Alameri home due to her "unwillingness to compromise." For more Bachelor -style happily-ever-afters, watch the video below!
